DOC.detailed_description: This study address vaccine uptake pregnant woman child , 20 month age , test hypothesis exposure P3+ intervention package increase likelihood pregnant woman get vaccinate influenza pertussis delivery get child vaccinated time . This study use multi-level factorial design randomize practice patient level . Obstetric practice Georgia Colorado randomize either intervention practice control practice . The woman recruit practice enrol study randomly assign intervention arm control arm . Women randomize intervention arm complete computer-based questionnaire ( administer via iPad preloaded study app ) ask basic demographic contact information ask question vaccine knowledge , attitude , belief . Immediately follow questionnaire , participant receive individual level intervention ( videos provide information vaccine ) iPad . In order best answer question provide information beyond scope study participant need want , video provide participant select base response survey question . There 6 video : one discuss danger disease prevent vaccine , others address specific vaccine concern ( concern include vaccine ingredient , child receive simultaneous vaccine ( multiple vaccine one time ) , safety receive tdap flu vaccine pregnancy ) . If participant concern , see video danger vaccine preventable disease . Participants express concern survey receive two video address concern , base order priority determine study researcher . Women randomize control arm also complete computer-based questionnaire include personal information vaccine knowledge , attitude , beliefs question continue receive usual prenatal care rather view informational video . All enrolled woman complete two follow-up survey child 30 day 18 month age .
DOC.criteria: Women currently pregnant first time Up 26 week gestational age Have previously participate study Able understand communicate English Have receive influenza and/or pertussis vaccine current pregnancy
